title: Sponsored: Teaching Kids & Teens Healthy Financial Habits - Smoky Mountain News
content: Sponsored: Teaching Kids & Teens Healthy Financial Habits  Smoky Mountain News
description: It is never too early to teach children and adolescents about budgeting and finance. Even the youngest of kids can learn how to manage money in a healthy way. The goal is for them to create habits that move with them into adulthood and ensure they make wise financial decision throughout their lives....
